Package interfaces

Interface TableInterface

  • All Superinterfaces:
    java.rmi.Remote
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    Table
    public interface TableInterface
extends java.rmi.Remote
    Operational interface of a remote object of type Table. It provides the functionality to access the Table.
